articles.author: Jeremy Herb, Kristen Holmes
articles.title: A ‘bizarro world’: How Trump’s words have scrambled America’s gun politics - CNN
articles.description: In the wake of a horrific shooting that shocked the nation, President Donald Trump starkly broke with pro-gun groups in off-the-cuff remarks: “Take the guns first, go through due process second,” Trump said during a televised meeting with lawmakers.

articles.title: How Chinese short-video streaming firms are reshaping Latin America's media landscape - CNBC
articles.description: Short-drama apps, many with Chinese origins, are making significant inroads in Latin America as the region becomes more affluent, research shows.
